table.name: vtiger_movement
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_movement` ( `movementid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `srcwhid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `pdoid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `dstwhid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `unitsmvto` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `moveno` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `refid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `seqno` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`movementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_movementcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_movementcf` ( `movementid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`movementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
